document_data.name: Finger of Fire
document_data.mainbody: '''''Finger of Fire''''' was a basic [[fire]]-based [[psionic]] power of the [[Metacreativity]] [[discipline]] that allowed one to manifest a mote of flames.
document_data.Effects: This power manifest motes of unstable flaring [[ectoplasm]] that explosively dissipates in flames at an area of choice, setting fire to anything flammable it touches in the process. The maximum targeting range of this power was {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Display: Manifesting this power produced a standard visual [[display]].

Notable Users.Creatures & Sentient Races: * [[blue (goblinoid)|Blue goblins]], a psionic subrace of [[goblin]]s, all had an innate ability to unleash ''Finger of Fire''.
Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Gaulauntyr]], an adult [[copper dragon]].{{Cite web/Wyrms of the North/Gaulauntyr, "Glorytongue"}}{{Gaulauntyr race}}
